price: 130. Ô vous qui avez cru ! Ne profitez pas des intérêts plusieurs fois multipliés de l’usure, craignez Allah, peut-être atteindrez-vous à la réussite.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَأۡكُلُواْ ٱلرِّبَوٰٓاْ أَضۡعَٰفٗا مُّضَٰعَفَةٗۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takulū al-riba aḍʿāfan muḍāʿafatan wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
